this is made possible by the nitro

next up the a doubles control tower

use you can get started today last but
not least brand new VP C traffic
mirroring this service lets you capture
and inspect network traffic at scale you
can see what's going on you can detect
network insecurity nominal ease you can
capture traffic for auditing purposes
really easy to use you create a target
that can be either an elastic network
interface or a network load balancer
from there use some filters you select
your traffic by protocol port or site or
block then you tie it all together you
make a session that uses a source a
target and a filter we've got a broad
